system.description:
Benefits

When the character calculates melee damage or uses a small or smaller melee weapon two-handed, they add 1½× their POW modifier to the damage. When wielding medium or larger melee weapon two-handed, they add 2× their POW modifier, and it results in at least a +2 damage bonus.

Normal

Using a weapon two-handed only grants a 1½× POW modifier, and using a small or smaller melee weapon two-handed grants a 1× POW modifier.
